Replace.Text: Requires Void Mode. [NEWLINE] Gain 30 layers of Suspicion when the selected civilization builds a city, with a minimum of 10 layers. Can produce Void units regardless of Suspicion layers. [NEWLINE] When the selected civilization loses a city, all cities gain +30 Suspicion.

Each city population provides 2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 1 [ICON_FOOD] food, the average "suspicion" level of the selected civilization city reduces this effect by 0.5%, and the average "suspicion" level of the non-selected civilization city reduces this effect by 0.5%. [NEWLINE] It has a special void unit Huangquan, and all void units initially have 1 level promotion.

Each layer of "Suspicion" reduces 1% [ICON_CULTURE] culture, 1% [ICON_SCIENCE] science, 1% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 1% [ICON_Tourism] tourism, 1% great person points, 1.5% [ICON_FOOD] food, 1.5% [ICON_FAITH] faith, 1.5% [ICON_GOLD] gold. [NEWLINE]Every 10 layers of "Suspicion" above 20 layers make the units on the city cell have at least 1 level of "self-destruction". After researching the municipal "Political Philosophy", the required number of layers of the effect is halved. [NEWLINE]Every 20 layers of "Suspicion" reduce 1 [ICON_AMENITIES] habitability and 1 loyalty. After researching the municipal "Enlightenment", the required number of layers is halved. [NEWLINE]Every 30 layers of "Suspicion" will spread 1 layer of "Suspicion" to the neighboring cities within 9 grids, and 1 layer of "Suspicion" will be attenuated for each grid. After researching the technology "Printing", the number of layers required for the effect is halved, and after researching the technology "Radio", the number of grids required for attenuation is doubled. When "Suspicion" reaches 99 layers, researching technology will no longer change the spread effect of the city. [NEWLINE]Every 50 layers of "Suspicion" will reduce 1 era point per turn, and the effect will be doubled after researching the municipal "Social Media". [NEWLINE][ICON_AMENITIES] For each part with a habitability less than 0, "Suspicion" +1, for each part greater than 3, "Suspicion" -1, and the effect will be doubled after researching the municipal "Ideology". The maximum number of "Suspicion" is 99, and a maximum of 15 layers of "Suspicion" can be obtained per turn. [NEWLINE]When the city is surrounded, "Suspicion" will be -5 per turn, and the effect will be doubled after researching the municipal "Humanism".

-1 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength per level of "Self-Destruction". [NEWLINE] -1 [ICON_Damaged] Health per level of "Self-Destruction" when "Self-Destruction" is 20 or higher. [NEWLINE] -1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement per 8 levels of "Self-Destruction". [NEWLINE] +1 "Self-Destruction" per turn. [NEWLINE] After a unit with "Self-Destruction" disappears, it is considered a *Self-Destruction* unit: +2 cities around it, +5 "Suspicion", and 25% chance to turn into a Barbarian.
Cities are not affected by the spread of "doubt"

Consume "Heal" to reduce "Suspicion" and improve relations. Every 5 layers of "Suspicion" reduced by the other civilization increases 1 relationship. If a unit "Heal" increases "Suspicion", the relationship is reduced in the same proportion. [NEWLINE] Initially has at least 1 level of "Self-Destruction", ignoring the [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement and [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength reduction of "Self-Destruction". [NEWLINE] If the "Self-Destruction" effect of non-empty units can be changed, its effect is the same as reducing the "Suspicion" effect of the city. [NEWLINE] Ignores area control and cannot be looted. Attacking units are considered to consume "Heal" times, and when defending, they gain the same combat strength as the highest combat strength unit [ICON_STRENGTH] created by the civilization, and the same bonus to air defense. [NEWLINE] Cannot gain experience, and after researching the municipal "Political Philosophy", "Enlightenment", and "Ideology", they gain a reinforcement upgrade, which is effective for units produced in the future. [NEWLINE]The following [COLOR:128,128,128,200] * Production suggestions [ENDCOLOR] are applicable to the initial situation, please adjust according to the promotion

A traveler who calls himself "Sea Patrolman", whose real name is unknown. He wears a long sword and travels alone in the Milky Way. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]He is indifferent and taciturn, and his sword strikes as fast as lightning, but he has always fought with the scabbard, never using it.

Features: Void unit, invisible, basic [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power is the same as the highest combat power unit produced by the selected civilization, consumes "healing" times to make itself and surrounding cell cities -20 "doubt", has a unique promotion tree, retreats after receiving fatal damage. [NEWLINE] Has level 99 "self-destruction" when created, "self-destruction" will not increase, ignores "self-destruction" effects, and removal is not considered *self-destruction*. [NEWLINE] After obtaining Huangquan, the selected civilization accumulates 1 layer of "residual dream" for Huangquan every time it attacks, 6 layers are obtained when created, and the maximum cumulative layer is 12 layers. [NEWLINE] "Residual dream" reaches 9 layers to enter the "residual dream soaked, one knife cuts off" state, unit +4 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement, +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, +4 "healing" times, +2 field of view. [NEWLINE]After the number of "Healing" is exhausted, 9 layers of "Remnant Dream" will be consumed, and "Remnant Dream Immerse, One Sword Cut Off" will be exited. Every 3 times "Remnant Dream Immerse, One Sword Cut Off" is released, Huang Quan can gain a strengthening upgrade.

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is greater than 0, consumes "Heal" times to make itself and surrounding cells -3 "Suspicion". [NEWLINE]Gives the city the status "Listen": The city's "Suspicion" growth caused by [ICON_AMENITIES] Habitability is halved, lasting 5 rounds. [NEWLINE]Removal is not considered *self-destruction* [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* Negative Habitability [ENDCOLOR]

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is greater than 0, consumes "healing" times to reduce "Suspicion" of itself and surrounding cells by 3. [NEWLINE] Doubles the diplomatic relations boost from reducing "Suspicion". [NEWLINE] Removal is not considered *self-destruction* [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* Requires reducing "Suspicion" of foreign countries [ENDCOLOR]

Special ability: "Self-destruction" is granted when the rock band is founded. Singing makes the band and the surrounding 2-tile cities -10 "Suspicion". +1 range and -5 "Suspicion" for each level of the rock band. [NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement.

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is not less than 30, consumes "Cure" times to make itself and surrounding cells -3 "Suspicion". [NEWLINE] Make "Suspicion" greater than 20 cities gain the state "Happy": City +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Habitability, lasts for 5 turns. [NEWLINE] Removal does not count as *self-destruction*. [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* Negative Habitability[ENDCOLOR]

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is not less than 30, consumes "Cure" times to make itself and surrounding cell cities -5 "Suspicion". [NEWLINE]When "Suspicion" is greater than 20, the city gains the status "Self-Proof": City +5% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science value, +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production value, lasts for 5 turns. [NEWLINE]Removal does not count as *self-destruction*. [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* has high productivity and needs higher productivity/science value[ENDCOLOR]

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is not less than 30, consumes 1 [ICON_Citizen] population to produce, can increase "self-destruction", loses all [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement after one round of production, consumes "healing" times to make itself and surrounding cell cities -1 [ICON_Citizen] population, +10 "Suspicion". [NEWLINE] Raising "Suspicion" doubles the reduction in diplomatic relations. [NEWLINE] Makes all cities of the civilization gain the status "terrible": city -1 [ICON_AMENITIES] habitability, lasts for 5 rounds. [NEWLINE] If it has not been "healed", removal is considered "healed". The "healing" effect on the unit also affects the [ICON_Damaged] health value. [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* Not recommended for production [ENDCOLOR]

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is greater than 0, consumes "Cure" times to make itself and surrounding cell cities -3 "Suspicion". [NEWLINE] Make "Suspicion" greater than 40 cities +1 [ICON_Citizen] population. [NEWLINE] Removal is not considered *self-destruction*, and exhaustion of "Cure" times is considered *cured*: self and surrounding cell cities -5 "Suspicion". [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* "Suspicion" is high and population is low [ENDCOLOR]

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is greater than 0, can reduce "self-destruction", consume "healing" times to make itself and surrounding cell cities have a 50% chance of -5 "Suspicion", a 25% chance of -15 "Suspicion", and a 25% chance of +5 "Suspicion". [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* "Suspicion" high[ENDCOLOR]

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is greater than 0, can increase "Self-Destruction", -20 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when attacking a city, and +1 "Suspicion" for itself and surrounding cells after consuming "Heal". [NEWLINE]Each attack unit gains +10 [ICON_GOLD] gold. [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* Sufficient Funds[ENDCOLOR]

Void unit, unlocked when "Suspicion" is not less than 50, can increase "Self-Destruction", has only 1 "Cure" time, and increases "Suspicion" of itself and surrounding cells by +20. [NEWLINE]Gives all cities of civilization the status "Insanity": Increase "Suspicion" for parts of cities [ICON_AMENITIES] with a habitability greater than 0, lasting 5 turns. [NEWLINE]If not "cured", removal is considered "cured", and the "Cure" effect on units also applies to [ICON_Damaged] health. [NEWLINE][COLOR:128,128,128,200]* War is at a disadvantage [ENDCOLOR]
The thunder and drums are silent, and the harp wind has also stopped.
Battle "Remnant Dream" +1, all civilizations produce or purchase units "Remnant Dream" +1
The true words of the high sky begin
When approaching a hostile city, the city will be placed under siege, and the attacker will be killed after being attacked.
The flames of eternity shine on the person in the mirror

After attacking, you can move. When attacking a civilization unit that is not [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] dissatisfied with your civilization, you will immediately kill the civilization unit and restore all [ICON_Damaged] health points, [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power and number of attacks.
Disasters and calamities freed us from shackles

+10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength, +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement for all ethereal units of the selected civilization. [NEWLINE]If the unit can clear less than 30% of the city's "Suspicion", directly clear 30% of the city's "Suspicion", and can clear "Self-Destruction". [NEWLINE]The city gains the status "Awake": The city is not affected by the spread of "Suspicion", which lasts for 5 rounds.
The combat strength and movement of units in the range are halved by "Self-Destruction"
Gives the city the "Listening" status: The city will not "doubt" the increase in [ICON_AMENITIES] amenity for 5 turns
+5 "Healing" effect on enemy civilized cities, +1 "Self-Destruction" for each enemy civilized city healed
The healing effect is doubled for enemy civilized cities
+5 "Healing" effect on enemy civilized cities, +20 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength when defending
+5 "Healing" effect, make "Suspicion" greater than 20 City gains the "Happy" status: City +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity, lasts for 5 turns
Can reduce "self-destruction" and make cities in range gain the "happy" status: City +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity, lasts for 5 turns
Gives the city with negative amenity in range the status "Happy": +5 [ICON_AMENITIES] amenity for the city, lasts for 5 turns, removal is considered *self-destruction*
+1 to the healing effect area. Units within the area have their [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength and [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement reduced by half by [Self-Destruction].
If "Suspicion" is greater than 20, the city gains the status "Self-Proof": +5% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science value, +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, lasts for 5 turns
If "Suspicion" is greater than 20, the city gains the status "Self-Proof": +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science value, +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, lasts for 5 turns
+2 "Heal" range, "Heal" -10 [ICON_Damaged] health points, and -3 [ICON_Citizen] population for itself and surrounding cities
"Heal" restores all health points, and gives all cities of the civilization the status "Terrible": City -3 [ICON_AMENITIES] Habitability, lasts for 5 turns
Give all cities of this civilization the "Terrible" status: -1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity per [ICON_Citizen] population in the city, for 5 turns
The [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength and [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement of units within the range are halved by the effect of "Self-Destruction".
Can reduce "Self-Destruction" and make "Suspicion" greater than 20. The city gains the status "Health Check": City +15% [ICON_FOOD] Food for 5 turns.
Can reduce "Self-Destruction" and make "Suspicion" greater than 40, city +3 [ICON_Citizen] population
The "Healing" effect is doubled. The "Healing" effect on the unit also applies to the health of [ICON_Damaged]
Doubles the healing effect on enemy civilized city units
If this civilization has only one city, units in range will die immediately
+4 "Heal" range, *Self-Destruction* effect changed to: If this civilization has only one city, all cities built in the past +99 "Suspicion"
View the suspected growth rate on this plot
Attack +2 "Remnant Dream", all civilizations produce or purchase units +1 "Remnant Dream", up to 12 layers. (Due to upgrading "Walking on the Passing Shore")

Consume "Heal" to reduce "Suspicion" and improve relations. Every 5 layers of "Suspicion" reduced by the other civilization will increase 1 relationship. If a unit "Heals" to increase "Suspicion", the relationship is reduced in the same proportion.
Once the number of "healing" times is exhausted, it is considered as *cured*
Halve the effect of [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength and [ICON_STRENGTH] movement strength of [self-destruction]
In certain situations, the unit will be killed instantly and all health points will be restored.
Gain status "Clear" (not affected by the spread of "Suspicion")
Gain the "Listening" status (due to [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity increase "Suspicion" halved)
Gain the "Listening" status (will not become "Suspicious" due to [ICON_AMENITIES] amenity increase)
Gain the status "Self-certification" (city +5% [ICON_SCIENCE] science value, +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity)
Gain the status "Self-certification" (city +5% [ICON_SCIENCE] science value, +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity)
Gain the status "Self-certification" (city +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] science value, +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity)
Gain the status "Insanity" (add "Suspicion" to the part of the city [ICON_AMENITIES] where the livability is greater than 0)
Self-destruction effect: If this civilization has only one city, all cities built in the past will receive +99 "Suspicion"
Not affected by the spread of suspicion
Due to [ICON_AMENITIES] the growth of livability is "suspected" to be halved
I won't be "suspicious" about the increase in [ICON_AMENITIES] livability
City [ICON_AMENITIES] Added "Suspicion" to parts where the livability is greater than 0
You have reduced the other civilization's "suspicion"
You have increased the other civilization's "suspicion"
Like the civilization that is about to win
Don't look back, there is no way back.
Like the civilization that is about to win
"Huang Quan"...Although it is just a borrowed name, you know who I am and remember what I have done. From now on...I am Huang Quan.
Don't forget to share the joy with your friends.
Perhaps there is more than one correct answer.
Let me walk with you a little longer.
If you have a sword, you have to cut something with it. There is only one reason why I draw my sword...in the past, now, and in the future.
Where memories are left, wherever you touch, they are all flowers with thorns...
Listening to the sound of rain falling from the red leaves and dripping onto the umbrella, I get a moment of peace from it.
Civilizations can gain "doubt". Pay attention to the [ICON_AMENITIES] amenity of the city!
Only the self-destructing Huangquan civilization can obtain "doubt"
Does not change the actual mechanism, but changes the display effect
It's you...We should all cherish the time we have with each other.
Is it you... or destiny's will that brought you here?
It's time for us to set off.
"Stepping into the same river twice"...is not difficult.
There is nothing we can do about this regret, so just let it go.
No problem, let’s end it here.

Those who travel alone in the Milky Way have only two desires: to find the footsteps of their predecessors and to find their own path. But under their watchful eyes, the latter mostly ends at the former.
It's raining...Want to walk together? Come on, I have an umbrella.
When I woke up from the other side, there was still thunder at the end of the sea and blood rain was falling from the sky.
The scenery in the distance is not clear...but it must be beautiful.
Man walks on the path of destiny...then seeks, then realizes, and then exists.
Our past makes us who we are today. Some things are hard to remember, and some are hard to forget.
Nice to meet you again. Do you want to dance again?
All or nothing…I’ll wait and see.
This life passes by like rain, and eventually returns to the earth. I hope that when we meet again... the sky will be clear.
You are not the first person, nor will you be the last, who can show such maliciousness after knowing my identity.
Whatever your purpose is... I can only see one outcome: its future is "nothingness", just like all the worlds drowning in its shadow.
There is not much time left to say goodbye.
A black hole is neither spectacular nor tragic. It is very quiet, like a lonely line of sight, looking at you and me... and then quietly swallowing everything in a cold, silent embrace.
